Description:
Al Amal Business Solutions is seeking a European, American, Canadian, Female Psychologist for an ultra-luxury hotel in KSA. This role will work within the hotel offering a range of psychological services to guests and employees. The successful candidate will have at least 5 years of experience in the field of psychology, preferably within a hospitality or luxury environment, and possess exceptional communication and interpersonal skills.Provide a range of psychological services to guests, including one-on-one counseling and group therapy sessions.
Develop and implement wellness programs and activities that promote mental health and emotional well-being.
Collaborate with other wellness professionals, such as personal trainers, nutritionists, and spa therapists, to create integrated wellness experiences for guests.
Conduct assessments and evaluations to identify guests' psychological needs and create personalized treatment plans.
Maintain accurate and confidential records of all guest interactions and treatment sessions.
Participate in team meetings and staff training sessions to stay up-to-date on the latest practices and techniques in the field of psychology.
Provide consultation and guidance to hotel staff and management on guest psychological concerns, and offer support and assistance in dealing with difficult situations.Job Details
